meanings.sent1: The tels on the hill were ancient ruins.
meanings.sent2: She counted the tels to make sure they were all there.
meanings.sent3: The tels whispered stories of the past to the curious visitors.
meanings.sent4: The tels stood tall like guardians of the valley.
meanings.sent5: The tels loomed large against the setting sun, casting long shadows.

meanings.definition: Tels - third person singular present of tel
meanings.sent1: He tels the story with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent2: She always tels the truth, no matter what.
meanings.sent3: The cat tels the mouse to be careful around the cheese.
meanings.sent4: The wind tels the leaves to dance in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent5: The teacher tels the students to listen carefully to the lesson.

meanings.sent1: She tels her friend about the exciting adventure.
meanings.sent2: He tels the secret to his sister.
meanings.sent3: The bird tels the other birds about the tasty berries.
meanings.sent4: The river tels the rocks of its journey from the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The old book tels the tale of a brave knight and a fierce dragon.
